subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
Football (College)
Robberies and Thefts
lead_paragraph: Oklahoma State running back Devon Thomas was jailed on felony complaints of armed robbery and shooting with intent to kill as investigators determined whether he fired a gun in a robbery earlier this week, narrowly missing the head of a potential victim.
